spring.name: Spring Festival
spring.description: Join us for a celebration of spring with music, food, and fun activities!

spring.name: Spring Flower Show
spring.description: Explore a stunning display of colorful spring flowers at our annual flower show.

summer.name: Summer Music Festival
summer.description: Dance to the beats of live music performances at our summer music festival!

summer.name: Summer Movie Nights
summer.description: Enjoy outdoor movie screenings under the stars with friends and family.

fall.name: Fall Harvest Festival
fall.description: Celebrate the autumn harvest with pumpkin carving, hayrides, and more!

fall.name: Fall Food and Wine Expo
fall.description: Sample delicious fall-inspired dishes and wines from local vendors.

winter.name: Winter Wonderland Ice Skating
winter.description: Glide across the ice and experience the magic of winter at our ice skating rink.

winter.name: Holiday Market
winter.description: Shop for unique gifts and festive decorations at our annual holiday market.
